attributes.comment:
As an Adoptive Parent, I find the enourmous increase in fees unjustified. During
our experience with your required offices and forms, we found it to be the slowest,
most innefficient process imaginable. The funding to improve this process should
be found in better processes and efficiencies, not in more funding for an overly
bureaucratic system. The amount of duplicated process that could have been
easily avoided (offices that don't have a phone???) and costly mistakes by
underqualified/unempowered employees was mind boggling. (With only parents
and children left to endure the consequences) Any for-profit company that was run
like the governmental offices/processes that adoptive parents are forced to use,
would be bankrupt and investigated!

To increase the fees without better serving parents and children is unimaginable.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Lili McCutchan
